questionSet.question: Sahil shone a torch and blew a horn at the same time, while standing at 15m distance from Amit. Amit will _______.

options.value: First hear the sound then see the light
First see the light then hear the sound
See the light and hear the sound at the same time

questionSet.rightAnswer: First see the light then hear the sound

questionSet.question: X is a force that works in the opposite direction of movement of an object in contact with a surface. It is _______.
Select the odd one out on the basis of type of mechanical force involved.

options.value: Opening the door of a refrigerator
Hitting the cricket ball with a bat to make run
Taking out water from a well using rope attached to a bucket

questionSet.rightAnswer: Hitting the cricket ball with a bat to make run

questionSet.question: Q can hear the sound made by P in the shortest time, when the medium is a _______.
Ritu cannot hear what Megha is saying, X must be ______.
